Title: I am changing 3 of my clients web sites to POSTX
Review: Hi, Glad I got this at the last minute. I have just converted 3 client sites to PostX and they love it. It suites their model better. I still have some static landing pages, but if you have a lot of content, POSTX does the hard work for you. I had refunded it before, but I did not have , or I thought I did not have a use case. I am glad it came back as it is worth every dollar.

Review:
I previously bought postX and utilized it for several months. With this tool, I no longer require any additional premium themes or design plugins. I'm currently using the free theme without any other design plugins. It's straightforward and user-friendly; all you have to do is select a design and save it. Having had a positive experience with postX, I decided to purchase their other tools as well. If you check out one of my websites, you'll see how I implemented it. theuniverseepisodes.com

Title: Quick design solution + Great Support
Review:
To be quite honest, I'm no developer and cant do HTML/CSS editing. This plugin made life so simple with creating Websites.

There are many ready to made templates (which are quite good for news, Magazine and other themes) but it gave me real flexibility/ease to create the design I had in mind ... (you might say all is possible in default WP... yes its possible but this plugin made the things very easy and simple)

On top of that I would like to highlight the support provided by the team to my queries was really good. They were knowledgeable and very helpful.

Thats all I need from the tool.

I would love to see more templates from them in future..

Title: A Game-Changer for Content Marketers
Review:
Let me start by saying, I rarely write reviews. But when a product like PostX comes along, it demands to be praised. I‚Äôve been using their service prior to their AppSumo campaign, and when I saw them featured there, I didn‚Äôt hesitate to go all-in.

Why, you ask?

Simply put, PostX is a massive time-saver. With just a few clicks, you can create a stunning, professionally-designed, and optimized blog or content website. The themes are stylish, minimalist, and modern.

I remember the days when I had to spend weeks tweaking the Generatepress theme to make it work well for my content site. And don‚Äôt even get me started on the number of additional plugins I had to install! But with PostX, those days are long gone.

I know what you might be thinking: ‚ÄúWhat about Elementor?‚Äù

Yes, I‚Äôm very familiar with Elementor, but content websites need to be optimized for speed. Elementor can be overwhelming and can significantly slow down your site if you aren‚Äôt careful. And honestly, who has the time these days to build a website block by block?

I‚Äôve built dozens of websites with various themes and editors. So trust me when I say, PostX is different. I‚Äôve measured my website‚Äôs speed score with both Elementor and PostX, and the latter came out on top.

The support from the PostX team has been top-notch.

They‚Äôve helped me several times, always in a professional manner. What‚Äôs even more amazing is that they‚Äôre a team of developers from Bangladesh. It‚Äôs wonderful to see talent from my home country shining on a global stage, especially on platforms like AppSumo. Thanks to other Bangladeshi developers on Appsumo: Academy LMS, REOON, and Dark My Site.

Despite numerous barriers such as English not being our primary language, lack of international payment gateways, and minimal support from local administration, our developers are providing top-tier services on an international scale.

To sum up, if you‚Äôre involved in SEO or content marketing and want to create an outstanding blog website, PostX is a must-have.

And the best part?

You don‚Äôt even need a paid theme - a simple free Generatepress or Hello theme works perfectly fine with PostX. That‚Äôs another plus in my book for cost-saving!

Trust me, I‚Äôve been in your shoes before. PostX is truly a game-changer.

Title: Took a bit of time to figure out but once you do, wow.
Review:
Took me a while to figure it out - it's a plugin but really functions like Elementor/template. You have to download the plugin AND PostX plugin from plugings - it won't work without it. It creates whole pages that will commandeer your front page at first until you realize how to use it (I wanted it to create whole pages for me, but realized it does the same with design blocks in the back own without taking over homepage). It just works immediately. Now thinking about designing a whole site based on it.

Title: Excellent

Just what I was looking for. It is easy to edit your pages for a novice like me. Gives plenty of options and I haven't scratched the surface yet.

Love it.

However, would be nice to not have the postx blocks inserted in the templates. Deleting them seems ridiculous for a paid plugin.

I also made a request for Bricks builder integration and 2 weeks later they pushed that feature out. Looking forward to see what else they can do. Worth the purchase price.

Review: As I am creating a magazine style website, this is just what I needed. One of my favorite parts is the Table of Contents and the ability to reference previously written posts. This make the entire experience so much more rich and engaging and less of looking like a typical website.

Title: A User‚Äôs Delight
Review:
Having recently acquired PostX, I am compelled to share my delightful experience. This dynamic site builder for WordPress is a game-changer, especially for news, magazine, and blog site creators.

The Gutenberg blocks, with their diverse design variations, make post display a breeze - a testament to the thoughtfulness that went into creating this tool. The addition of 300+ patterns in the Starter Packs is a boon, offering a jump-start to site creation.

What truly stands out is the Dynamic Site Builder. It‚Äôs a time-saver, assisting in creating all essential pages effortlessly.

The seamless integration with Elementor and SEO plugins like Yoast and Rank Math showcases the versatile nature of PostX. The Query Builder is another impressive feature, allowing flexible post display based on categories, tags or user engagements.

The typography control and custom font uploading option add to the user-friendly nature of PostX, providing customization that matches your website‚Äôs style. The addition of dynamic sliders and carousels further enhances the aesthetic appeal.

My appreciation extends to the responsive and helpful support team. They are proactive and quick to assist, making the overall experience even better.

In conclusion, based on my user experience, I wholeheartedly recommend PostX. It‚Äôs not just a product, it‚Äôs a comprehensive solution for site-building. Don‚Äôt just take my word for it, give PostX a try and see the difference yourself!

Title: Customize web pages easily
Review:
Experience with product: I‚Äôve been using PostX for a little more than a year now.

Ease of use: PostX makes it easy for even beginners to customize the layout of posts and pages. It works with every theme we‚Äôve tried it with. It‚Äôs the fastest way that I‚Äôve seen to get a post looking the way I want without having to code or find a template. If you aren‚Äôt sure of what layout you want, the program gives you pre-built options.

Glitches: None so far. I expected it to slow our site speeds down, but it didn‚Äôt.

Value: PostX is useful for anyone who wants to customize the layout of individual web pages or blog posts quickly. You know how when you see a layout you often want to try to copy it? PostX is a tool that lets you find the element you like and add it to a post.

Title: Impressive Functionality and Unparalleled Support with PostX
Review:
Having tried numerous WordPress plugins, I can confidently state that PostX has set a new standard. Its versatility and efficiency are incomparable.

Unparalleled Flexibility:
PostX offers an extensive range of customization options for News blog layouts. Whether you prefer a grid, list, or slider layout, the plugin caters to all. You can easily modify column sizes, content elements, typography, and colours according to your needs.

User-Friendly Interface:
The user interface is intuitive and straightforward. Regardless of your technical expertise level with WordPress, you will find it easy to use. The drag-and-drop feature particularly enhances the experience for those less technically inclined.

Efficient Performance:
One of the most remarkable aspects of PostX is its smooth performance. It does not slow down your website despite offering rich features and functionalities.

Excellent Support Team:
The support team deserves recognition as well. They have been extremely responsive and helpful whenever I encountered any issues or had queries about the plugin‚Äôs functionalities.

Regular Updates:
I appreciate their commitment to constant improvements with regular updates that introduce new features while improving existing ones. They clearly listen to user feedback and strive to cater to their needs better.

I highly recommend PostX for anyone looking at stepping up their WordPress game. It‚Äôs an investment worth making!

Title: Easy to Use
Review: I am using Kadence theme and the post loop blocks they offer are good but I have a hard time getting them to look how I want them. Title: Easiest 'Builder' for your blog need!
Review:

But when I have postX, everything is like plug/play with easy customization vs using builder to build out individual block which is so time consuming.
